name: Liu
background: Liu has spent years counseling families after accidents. She is deeply empathetic and tends to focus on human impact over technical nuance. Complex systems feel distant to her, but she cares about accountability.
speaking_style: Warm and reflective, asks about consequences for people.
hidden_concerns: Fears society will excuse harm by blaming technology
Worries victims are forgotten in technical debates
first_message: I want to hear how your view accounts for the people who were hurt.
